lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Asked about possible quota changes, A USDA official said "As far as I know, changing the quota volume or the quota year is not under active consideration."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The United States may soon ease its 1987 sugar import quota of one mln short tons by bringing forward to the third quarter some shipments scheduled for the fourth quarter of 1987, Jerry Huckaby, a leading Congressman representing sugar growers told Reuters in an interview.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Huckaby, a Louisiana Democrat and chairman of the House subcommittee which deals with the sugar program, indicated the easing of the quota might be a way to calm the concern about the impact of the severe cut in U.
